page.title: 15Home Life
page.content: When the alarm clock rings at 7.30am it's time to get up and have our breakfast.We have cereal which consists of either Weetabix or Cornflakes then we have toast which is done in an electric toaster.Also for breakfast we have a cold or hot drink like tea,coffee,orange or milk.For our midday snack we have a few sandwiches, a packet of crisps and a cold drink.For our evening meal we sometimes have beefburgers and chips.If the weather is hot we might have a salad.On Sundays we have a roast dinner. In Barrowby many people have showers and most homes in the village have toilets,sinks and bath.In the lounge there is usually a television.Most kitchens are equipped with a fridge,a freezer,a cooker,an electric mixer and a microwave oven.
